name: Enventor 1-1/4 Inch SDS-Plus 13A Heavy Duty Rotary Hammer Drill for Concrete Stone, Safety Clutch Electric Demolition Hammer Drill with 4 Functions, Vibration Control, Chisels, Drill Bits, Blue
short_description: MAX POWER PERFORMANCE: The powerful 13Amp motor (‎1500W) of this rotary hammer drill with 6 Joules impact energy with SDS Plus function can reach a maximum speed of 0-850RPM to complete heavy duty projects such as concrete, masonry and metal with higher efficiency.

4 in 1 MULTI-FUNCTION DEMOLITION HAMMER: Easily use the Knob can switch different modes of the motor arbitrarily (drill mode, hammer mode, PIT positioning, hammer drill mode), suitable for a variety of work scenarios. The corded hammer drills for concrete and brickwork are 1-1/4 inch (32mm), wood 1-5/8 inch (40mm), and steel 1/2 inch (13mm).

SAFETY CLUTCH: Demolition hammer 1-1/4 inch safety clutch protection design protects your wrist when the SDS drill hammer is subjected to high torque if the bit ever gets jammed while using it in any tasks such as brick chipping, tile, and floor removal, or even making holes in concrete, masonry, metal, or wood.

HUMANIZATION DESIGN: ENVENTOR heavy-duty rotary hammer drill has a 360° rotating handle that is suitable for different angles of work and reduces fatigue. The soft-grip handle of this chipping hammer effectively prevents sliding and brings a better and more comfortable grip during use. The SDS-PLUS chuck allows you to change the drill bit quickly and easily. This rotary hammer has a 6.56ft/2m long power cable.

WHAT YOU GET: 1x Rotary Hammer Drill Blue, 3 x SDS Drill Bits ( 8mm,10mm,12mm), 1x Auxiliary Handle, 1 x 30g Universal Lubricating Grease, 1 x Guide Ruler, 2x Replacement Carbon Brushes, 1x Oil Cap Wrench, 1 x Flat Chisel (14x250mm), 1 x Point Chisel(14x250mm), 1 x User Manual, 1 x Carrying Case.

name: Metabo HPT Rotary Hammer, 1-9/16-Inch, SDS Max (DH40MC)
short_description: POWERFUL: 10 amp motor produces 6.3 ft. lbs of impact energy for tough jobsite applications
SIDE HANDLE: 360o side handle provides additional comfort and control
IMPACT RATE: 2,800 Full load max impact rate to quickly remove stubborn materials
RPM: 620 No-load RPM for faster drilling speed
CLUTCH: Needle pin slip clutch for improved user protection in bound bit situations
GRIP: Soft over-molded handle for added comfort and control, less fatigue
DUEL MODES: Two modes of operation allow for greater versatility by providing the option of hammer drilling or hammer only
EASY SWITCHING: Large change lever for easy mode switching
TRIGGER: Large trigger switch for easy grip and control
product_description: The 1-9/16 Inch SDS Max Rotary Hammer (DH40MC) is designed to take on a variety of tasks including drilling holes in a concrete for anchors or rebar, demolishing and chiseling concrete, cutting, digging, tamping or driving ground rods. This powerful 10 amp motor produces 6.3 foot pounds of Impact Energy and delivers top of class drilling speed. It's also easy and comfortable to use with an oversized knob that changes the mode from hammer drilling to hammer only, and an oversized trigger that is easy to use while wearing gloves.

name: BOSCH GBH18V-26DK15 18V EC Brushless SDS-plus® Bulldog™ 1 In. Rotary Hammer Kit with (1) CORE18V® 4 Ah Advanced Power Battery
short_description: LEGENDARY BULLDOG PERFORMANCE: Lightweight d-handle hammer consistently outperforms best-selling 1 in. corded 11255vsr
SUPERIOR IMPACT: Delivers 1.9 ft.-lbs. of impact energy (epta) for max performance in drilling, chipping applications in concrete
CORE18V BATTERY: Provides next-gen li-ion 21700 cell technology in a lightweight, high-power battery with great runtime
EFFICIENT EC BRUSHLESS MOTOR: Maximizes battery runtime in extended applications
KICKBACK CONTROL TECHNOLOGY: Reduces the risk of sudden tool reactions in binding conditions
D-HANDLE DESIGN: Ideal for overhead, horizontal and downward drilling applications
LIGHTWEIGHT, AT ONLY 5.8 LBS. (TOOL ONLY, NOT INCLUDING BATTERY): Provides maneuverability for concrete drilling anywhere on the jobsite
VARIABLE-SPEED REVERSING TRIGGER: Allows for accurate bit starting

BOSCH 18V CORDLESS POWER TOOLS AND 18V CHARGERS ARE COVERED BY A FIVE YEAR LIMITED WARRANTY; BOSCH 18V BATTERIES ARE COVERED BY A THREE YEAR LIMITED WARRANTY: For details, visit https://rb-pt.io/powertoolwarranty or call 1-877-bosch99
SDS-PLUS CHUCK: Industry-Standard system compatible with many bits
product_description: This Bosch D-handle Bulldog™ hammer consistently outperforms the best-selling 1 In. corded 11255VSR Bulldog™, making it better than the best. The GBH18V-26DK15 18V EC Brushless SDS-plus® Bulldog™ 1 In. Rotary Hammer Kit features a hammer that delivers 1.9 Ft.-Lbs. of impact energy, based on the industry standard of measurement agreed upon by the European Power Tool Association (EPTA). It weighs only 5.8 Lbs. (tool only, not including battery), delivering superior performance and an outstanding impact-to-weight ratio. The kit features a CORE18V Advanced Power Battery, which has next-gen Li-ion 21700 cell technology for extended performance in lightweight, high-power battery. The hammer’s EC Brushless motor maximizes battery runtime for extended performance. The tool features a jobsite-proven D-handle design with soft-grip and is ideal for overhead, horizontal and downward drilling applications. It also has KickBack Control, an integrated sensor to stop tool rotation in bind-up situations. The hammer features a variable-speed reversing trigger for accurate bit starting.

name: Makita XRH04Z 18V LXT® Lithium-Ion Cordless 7/8" Rotary Hammer, accepts SDS-PLUS bits, Tool Only
short_description: Makita-built variable speed motor delivers 0-1,200 RPM and 0-4,000 BPM
3-mode operation for "Rotation Only", "Hammering with Rotation" or "Hammering Only" for multiple applications
Torque limiting clutch engineered to prevent gear damage by automatically disengaging gears if the bit binds
Faster drilling with synchronized RPM and BPM
Job site tested shock absorbent handle protects the battery housing for extra durability
product_description: The Makita 18V LXT Lithium-Ion Cordless 7/8" SDS-Plus Rotary Hammer (model XRH04Z, tool only) delivers faster, more efficient percussive drilling to the jobsite. The versatile XRH04Z has 3-mode operation and a built-in torque limiter to ensure stable torque control for a range of concrete drilling tasks, with a more compact design and less vibration. It's part of Makita's expanding 18V Lithium-Ion series, the world's largest cordless tool line-up powered by an 18V Lithium-Ion slide-style battery. Makita 18V Lithium-Ion batteries have the fastest charge times in their categories, so they spend more time working and less time sitting on the charger.

name: BOSCH 11255VSR Bulldog Xtreme 8 Amp 1 Inch Corded Variable Speed SDS-Plus Concrete/Masonry Rotary Hammer
short_description: 3 MODES: multi-function selector offers 3 modes of operation; Rotation-only, rotary hammer, and hammer only mode; Variable speed trigger with reverse offers accurate bit starting or easy fastener removing
EASE OF USE: vibration control for comfort in all day applications
ERGONOMIC: D-handle design provides comfort and optimal control, especially for overhead or downward drilling applications

CONVENIENT: SDS-plus bit system provides tool-free bit changes with automatic bit locking, dust protection and maximum impact energy transfer; Vario lock positioning offers 36 bit positions for optimized chiseling angle
POWER: 7.5 amp motor produces 0.1,300 RPM and 0.5,800 BPM to power through the toughest applications; delivers 2.0 feet /pounds of impact energy for maximum performance
INCLUDES: rotary hammer, (1) auxiliary handle, (1) depth gauge and a carrying case
product_description: Get a fast, long lasting rotary hammer with the BOSCH bulldog extreme 1 inch Rotary hammer. It features a multi-function selector that quickly shifts between rotation only, rotary hammer and hammer only modes for optimal versatility. It also has a variable Speed reversing trigger for accurate bit starts and simple removal of fasteners and bound bits.

name: Dong Cheng 1-1/8 Inch SDS-Plus Rotary Hammer Drill with Safety Clutch, 9.2 Amp Heavy Duty Corded Demolition Hammer for Concrete, 3.6 Joules, Including 3 Drill Bits, Flat Chisels and Point Chisels
short_description: 【Powerful Durable Motor】Power durable rotary hammer drill is equipped with 9.2 Amp (1100W) motor that delivers 1300 RPM, 5,000 BPM, and 3.6 Joules impact energy to complete heavy duty projects on concrete, Masonry and metal.
【Safety Clutch Design】 Safety clutch protection design to guarantee your wrist When the hammer is subjected to high torque force and extend motor's lifespan.

【2-function Selector】Mode in 1 knob to manually switch between rotary hammer only(suitable for concrete or brick) and demolition drill(suitable for heavy duty work) function adapt to variety of work scenarios which are easy to switch.

【High-Efficient Work】SDS-Plus chuck for quick bit change and variety of demanding applications. 360°auxiliary anti-vibration handle with all-metal depth rod increased the controllability and stability.
【Ergonomic and Comfortable Design】Cushioned overmold grip with large trigger switch design for comfort & control Well.Vibration reduction mechanism reduces vibration felt by the user at the handles.

【Rugged Quality and Reliability】Engineered cooling mechanism with large ventilate construction allows for More effective heat dissipation and higher overload capacity. Sturdy structure extends the tool lifetime.

【What’s in The Box】(1) Rotary Hammer Drill, (3)SDS-Plus Drilling/Drill Bits,(1)Flat Chisel, (1)Point Chisel,(2)Carbon Brushes,(1)Auxiliary Handle,(1)Depth Stop Rod,(1)Grease,(1)Dust Proof Cap,(1)Heavy Duty Storage Box(1)User Manual.

name: 3 in 1 Hammer Drill, 1-1/4 Inch SDS-Plus 13 Amp Heavy Duty Rotary Hammer Drill, 4 Functions and Variable Speed, Including 4 Drill Bits,Flat Chisel, Point Chisel, User Manual (green)
short_description: 💪【POWERFUL MOTOR】 Our high-performance electric rotary hammer features a 13Amp industrial motor with 5.2 feet /lbs（7 joules) impact energy, making it perfect for heavy duty concrete work. The heat resistant copper wire motor ensures long working periods without overheating. The anti-dust bottom structure extends the lifespan of the hammer. Trust in the power and precision of our rotary hammer to increase your efficiency and enhance your work.

💪【DURABLE CONSTRUCTION】Made from high-quality metal, plastic material. Electric hammer with high performance bits accessories will save your time and energy in DIY tasks. Built with robust materials for durability, it can withstand prolonged, high-intensity use. Suitable for continuous operation in challenging environments, ensuring long-term stability and reliability. It's perfect for quickly removing old walls, floors, foundations, and more, saving time and labor costs.

💪【HUMANIZATION DESIGN】 Designed ergonomically with a comfortable grip and anti-vibration technology, it reduces fatigue during extended use. This enhances control and stability, allowing for precise and effective demolition work. Incorporates safety features such as overload protection and a secure locking mechanism to prevent accidental operation, ensuring user safety during operation.

💪【PORTABILITY AND STORAGE CONVENIENCE】Designed for easy maintenance with accessible components and straightforward cleaning procedures, enhancing overall usability and longevity. Despite its robust build, it remains portable and easy to store, making it suitable for both professional contractors and DIY enthusiasts who need a reliable tool that is also manageable.

💪【CONVENIENT TO USE】The SDS hammer drill features a user-friendly design offers more precise drilling or chiseling effects. The vibration-dampening system reduces fatigue in the arm and wrists, offering a more comfortable working experience. The safety clutch function prevents motor overload and accidental injuries, reducing damage to the rotary hammer and extending its lifespan.

name: Makita HR2475 1" Rotary Hammer, accepts SDS-PLUS bits (D-handle)
short_description: Powerful 7.0 AMP motor delivers 2 ft.lbs./2.7 j. of impact energy to handle the most demanding applications
3-mode operation for "Rotation Only", "Hammering with Rotation" or "Hammering Only" for multiple applications
One-touch sliding chuck for quick bit changes
Torque limiting clutch engineered to prevent gear damage by automatically disengaging gears if the bit binds
Variable speed trigger enables user to match the speed to the application for greater versatility
product_description: Makita’s versatile HR2475 1-inch rotary hammer (accepts SDS-Plus) delivers more efficient hitting in a compact size for faster, more productive work.

name: DEWALT 20V MAX SDS Plus Rotary Hammer Drill, Cordless, 5/8 in., Tool Only (DCH172B)
short_description: Fast drilling in concrete with 1.4 joules of impact energy
Lightweight design: ideal for rod hanging, concrete forming, cable tray and strut mounting, clip and bracket mounting, and railing mounting
Brushless Motor & German-Engineered Mechanism for efficient performance and runtime
SHOCKS active vibration control system reduces vibration felt by the user at the handles comparted to rotary hammers without this feature
OSHA table 1 compliant when paired with DWH200D shroud and DWH161D1 dust extractor
Mode selector switch: quickly switch between drill and hammer drill applications
product_description: Take on jobs in tight spaces with this high-performance ATOMIC 20V MAX* 5/8 in. Brushless Cordless SDS Plus Rotary Hammer. Featuring a brushless motor and a durable German-engineered mechanism, this tool delivers 1.4 Joules of impact energy. The lightweight and compact design makes this tool ideal for rod hanging, concrete forming, cable tray and strut mounting, clip and bracket mounting, and railing mounting.

name: ENEACRO 1-1/4 Inch SDS-Plus 13 Amp Heavy Duty Rotary Hammer Drill, Safety Clutch 4 Functions with Vibration Control Including Grease, Chisels and Drill Bits with Case
short_description: 【POWERFUL MOTOR】 Our ENRH3201 high-performance electric rotary hammer features a 13Amp industrial motor with 5.5 feet /lbs（7.4 joules) impact energy, making it perfect for heavy duty concrete work. The heat resistant copper wire motor ensures long working periods without overheating. The anti-dust bottom structure extends the lifespan of the hammer. Trust in the power and precision of our rotary hammer to increase your efficiency and enhance your work.

【FOUR FUNCTIONS】 Our rotary hammer offers four different functions of drill only mode(suitable for wood, steel , etc.), hammer only mode(suitable for concrete or brick) ,hammer drill mode(suitable for heavy duty work) and chisel position adjustment adapt to variety of work scenarios which are easy to switch. Easily switch between functions using our two different switches. The double function switch design extends the service life by 100% compared to single function switches.

【THOUGHTFUL HUMANIZED DESIGN】 For your safety and comfort, we have designed the ENRH3201 with a safety clutch protection to protect your wrist from high torque force. The 360° adjustable handle allows for easy handling in different work scenarios. Our upgraded double layer anti-vibration system effectively reduces vibrations and minimizes fatigue. The PU soft grip handle prevents slipping, ensuring a comfortable and secure grip during use.

【DRILLING CAPACITY】 The ENRH3201 rotary hammer drill has a maximum drilling diameter of 1.25 inch for concrete and 0.5 inch for metal. With a no-load speed of 820 r/min and a max impact frequency of 4200bpm, our rotary hammer delivers efficient and powerful performance. The sds-plus chuck allows for quick and secure bit changes, ensuring uninterrupted progress on your projects.

【SPECIFICATION】 The bare machine weight of ENRH3201 rotary hammer is 12.58 Lbs. The dimensions are ‎15.36"L x 10.24"W x 4.53"H. The total weight includes all accessories is 18.1Lbs. and overall shipping dimensions are 17.32"L x 13.46"W x 4.96"H. You can use it to remove tiles or demolishing brickwork. It is also suitable for masonry, concrete and brick.

【WHAT YOU WILL GET】 Purchase includes: ENRH3201 rotary hammer * 1; sds-plus drill bits（8mm,10mm,12mm） * 3; sds-plus 10-inch chisel * 2; Auxiliary handle * 1； Replaceable carbon brush * 1 set; Lubricant Grease * 1； Dust proof cap * 1； Carrying Case * 1; 24 Months Defect Free Service and 12 working hours reply. This all-inclusive kit equips you for success, making it a valuable choice for professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike.
